PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-09772023-10-06FIN
ActRoyal Canadian Mint Act
PrecisApproval of the re-appointment by the Minister of Finance of PINA MELCHIONNA of Cobourg, Ontario, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Royal Canadian Mint, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Approval of the re-appointment by the Minister of Finance of PINA MELCHIONNA of Cobourg, Ontario, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Royal Canadian Mint, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years.
